changelog.text:
ADDED link for swag store
ADDED option for binary user scores
IMRPOVED follows - select either all or specific user for recent feed

ADDED intro - see the core features in one place
IMPROVED blocking - no app notifications from blocked users
ADDED widgets devRant/devRantText/stressBall/fml

ADDED ability to view recent feed of following only
ADDED ability to hide follows btn
IMPROVED following - quickly remove follows and backup easily
IMPROVED images - rants and comments show images in full

ADDED ability to chill rants by converting them to lower-case (option will be shown only for rants with a majority of upper-case characters)
ADDED ability to follow users to find them easily again
IMPROVED profile page - easy user blocking, following, downloading of avatars etc.

ADDED supporter's page
MISC removed GitHub deep linking

ADDED option to not display username on main page (recommended for small devices)
IMPROVED notifications - choose what notif categories you want to receive!
IMPROVED notifications - multiple at once
FIXED opening notifications not working on devices < Android 12
FIXED broken linking for collabs

ADDED option to view comments made by user
ADDED ability to view ++'s by user
ADDED ability to block rants by words
ADDED ability to block users rants
ADDED ability to set app language to german
IMPROVED link preview alignements
IMPROVED text - readability
FIXED minor bugs

// gonna filter all them gpt 'rants' now :P
FIXED ui elements

ADDED profile rants
ADDED profile comments
ADDED profile ++'s
ADDED profile Github preview
FIXED broken Github blog url

IMPROVED more btns
FIXED about info

ADDED Github page for repository
ADDED Github page for profile
ADDED Github deep linking
ADDED Github key generation option
IMPROVED coffee theme
IMPROVED settings page - btns now stand out

ADDED new theme (coffee)
IMPROVED light theme
IMPROVED performance of various horizontal menus

ADDED surprise btn to get a new surprise
ADDED refresh btns
IMPROVED search - keyboard now shows search btn
FIXED deep linking - no empty feed on back-press

ADDED notifications

// let's not talk abt how they work lol

ADDED discord like theme
ADDED green theme
IMPROVED the main UI btns are easy to press now
IMPROVED community page - link preview has been added
ADDED link previews will now appear on rants and comments

ADDED the Avatar editor
IMPROVED community page is now dynamic to new types and OS's
FIXED app crashing when tapping on an image that wasn't stored in an intent
FIXED tags were confusingly all underlined together
FIXED search re-appearing by itself

ADDED ability to search devRant
ADDED ability to change search text
ADDED ability to tap on tags to view more
IMPROVED community page, added filter: bot
FIXED keyboard not hiding after saving rant limit

ADDED ability to change about, location, website, github, skills
ADDED changelog (pings a Github API file)
ADDED up/down voting on feed
ADDED double-tap to upvote (currently only on rant activity)
ADDED missing location on profiles
FIXED weird spaces on rants at linebreaks
FIXED login issue (bad request)

ADDED feed settings
FIXED small alignement issues
// build version 2 is missing oh no

SKYRANT first release of client

// Hello World !
